item.description:
Troy Brown is back at the Sidewalk Cafe in Hartford this Friday!!!!!!!

For those of you that came to my party and listened and danced to the R & B jazz stylings of Troy Brown and Friends or met us at the Sidewalk Cafe this past Friday...you're in for a treat! Troy is playing this weekend in Hartford and we want to get a crowd together to dance up a storm again!

Come out and play with us and Troy...he is the BEST! I know EVERYONE just loved him at my party...so come find out what you missed if you were not able to attend. I promise you that you absolutely WILL NOT be able to sit thru his music!

Band starts between 8 and 8:30 pm. I will be there at reserved tables at 8 pm. Looking so forward to this...oh yeah!!!!!!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Terri or the Meetup Sign...
item.name: Troy Brown @ The Side Walk Cafe...
